about_the_game:
You play the role of a Security Guard and your task is to set up security measures to prevent thieves from stealing from your customers!
You will have a number of devices at your disposal, such as various types of cameras and sensors to detect and track thieves and lock them in rooms and several tools to prevent them from moving further.




Call SECURITY GUY
Did you know that on average, 5 burglars visit your home every night? Money hidden in the mattress won't deter them, and reinforced doors and windows won't stop their intrusion. Who can you trust in these tough times?

Tools of Justice
At our disposal, we have all the tools to thwart wrongdoers: smart surveillance, acoustic sonars, law enforcement alerts, motion sensors, spy cams, laser tech, satellite assistance.

Interesting Places, Interesting People
We provide services both in single-family housing estates and in state institutions, as well as in offices of mega corporations and personal estates of the mega-rich. Wherever there can be a camera, there could be a Security Guy.

Faces of Crime
  • Amateurs - opportunistic bullies, who operate on their own with the grace of a bull in a China shop.
  • Professionals - they know their job, they know their goal, they know their calling. They know what we have available and they also know how to avoid it.
  • Masters - Robbers, bandits, plunderers, mercenaries, hackers, villains. They have been playing this game for decades and they know the tricks.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows(64-bit) 7 or Newer
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 3.0 GHz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVidia GeForce GTX 660 2GB
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 10 GB available space

short_description: Set up security measures to catch dastardly thieves red-handed. Investigate a variety of exciting, colorful locations and adapt your tools to their environments to persecute burglars with maximum efficiency.
supported_languages:
English*, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Traditional Chinese, Simplified Chinese, Czech, Polish, Portuguese - Portugal, Portuguese - Brazil, Russian, Swedish, Thai, Turkish, Ukrainian, Hungarian
*languages with full audio support
